text: Philippine presidents issue executive orders to help officers and agencies of the executive branch manage the operations within the government itself. Listed below are executive orders signed by Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte. ==Executive orders== ===2016=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col" | ! scope="col" | Title / Description ! scope="col" | Date signed ! scope="col" class="unsortable"| |- ! scope="row" | 1 | style="text-align:left;" | Reengineering the Office of the President Towards Greater Responsiveness to the Attainment of Development Goals | June 30, 2016 | |- ! scope="row" | 2 | style="text-align:left;" | Operationalizing in the Executive Branch the People's Constitutional Right to Information and the State Policies to Full Public Disclosure and Transparency in the Public Service and. Providing Guidelines Therefor | July 23, 2016 | |- ! scope="row" | 3 | style="text-align:left;" | Increasing the Rates of Combat Duty Pay and Combat Incentive Pay of the Armed Forces of the Philippines and Extending the Same Allowances to the Uniformed Personnel of the Philippine National Police, Amending Therefor Executive Order No. 38 (s. 2011) | September 26, 2016 | |- ! scope="row" | 4 | style="text-align:left;" | Providing for the Establishment and Support of Drug Abuse Treatment and Rehabilitation Centers Throughout the Philippines | October 11, 2016 | |- ! scope="row" | 5 | style="text-align:left;" | Approving and Adopting the Twenty-Five-Year Long Term Vision Entitled Ambisyon Natin 2040 as Guide for Development Planning | October 11, 2016 | |- ! scope="row" | 6 | style="text- align:left;" | Institutionalizing the 8888 Citizens' Complaint Hotline and Establishing the 8888 Citizen's Complaint Center | October 14, 2016 | |- ! scope="row" | 7 | style="text-align:left;" | Amending Executive Order No. 43 (s. 2011) Entitled "Pursuing Our Social Contract With the Filipino People through the Reorganization" to Designate the Department of National Defense Secretary as the Chairperson of the Security, Justice and Peace Cluster | October 14, 2016 | |- ! scope="row" | 8 | style="text-align:left;" | Amending Further Executive Order No. 120 (s. 2012), as Amended by Executive Order No. 187 (s. 2015), on the Bangsamoro Transition Commission and for Other Purposes | November 8, 2016 | |- ! scope="row" | 9 | style="text-align:left;" | Strengthening the Office of the Cabinet Secretary, Enhancing its Powers and Functions, Providing for its Support Staff and for Other Purposes | December 1, 2016 | |- ! scope="row" | 10 | style="text-align:left;" | Creating a Consultative Committee to Review the 1987 Constitution | December 7, 2016 | |- ! scope="row" | 11 | style="text-align:left;" | Extending Further the Term of South Cotabato/North Cotabato/Sultan Kudarat/ Sarangani/General Santos City (SOCSKSARGEN) Area Development Project Office (ADPO) to December 31, 2022, Amending for the Purpose Executive Order No. 507 (s. 2006), as Amended | December 29, 2016 | |} ===2017=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center;" |- ! scope="row" | 13 | style="text-align:left;" | Strengthening the Fight Against Illegal Gambling and Clarifying the Jurisdiction and Authority of Concerned Agencies in the Regulation and Licensing of Gambling and Online Gaming Facilities, and for Other Purposes | February 2, 2017 | |- ! title: List of executive orders by Rodrigo Duterte
